snippet.description:
MODX: Pay-with-a-tweet for Facebook
Last updated September 18, 2013

snippet.title: nielsdon/woocommerce-facebook-opengraph-products
snippet.description:
Display your products in a very neat way when posting a link in Facebook. We don't need to pay for this!
Last updated January 10, 2014

snippet.title: ederFortunato/tyrion-chat
snippet.description:
a simples chat system, like gTalk or facebook, and which always pays his debts.
Last updated September 20, 2013

snippet.title: VTVMedia/Free-VTV-Online-TV-Application
snippet.description:
"Watch What U Want, When U Want, and We'll Pay You To Watch". No signups, NO Startup Or Ongoing Fee's, Just Pure Free Entertainment On Facebook
Last updated July 21, 2010

snippet.title: Gerst20051/ThePayMonkey
snippet.description:
PayMonkey is a rudimentary but functional group payments platform built during 16 hours of a 24 hour Facebook Hackathon at Duke University by Soroush Pour, Fabio Berger & Andrew Gerst
Last updated March 28, 2013

snippet.title: bigfolio/pixel-calendar
snippet.description:
An community event calendar and directory designed for niches and verticals. Allows users to add events and sell tickets via PayPal. Includes Facebook Connect and Google Map integration. We use it at PixelCal.com
Last updated August 25, 2010

snippet.title: arissamad/ArisHour-Hockey-Booking-System
snippet.description:
A Google App that allows users to 1) Log in with Facebook, 2) Sign up for hockey sessions (or any sssion). 3) Each user has an account, and can pre-pay.
Last updated May 20, 2012

snippet.title: khf118/Nature-s-Protector
snippet.description:
"Nature's protector" sera un site qui enregistre des rapports sur les endroits pollués (principalement en Tunisie). Les utilisateurs auront la possibilité de se connecter avec leur compte Facebook ou Twitter afin de signaler les emplacement pollués sur
Last updated September 08, 2013

snippet.title: simple2602/dwdada
snippet.description:
le discours des dirigeants et des joueurs reste très modeste I also have the same issues. I had the Facebook and Twitter gadget in a column and they fit nicely and now I have scrollbars which sucks. You guys made an excellent and compact Facebook widget
Last updated May 20, 2013
